items.creator: This Week in DAOS
items.title: This Week in DAOs #006
items.dc:creator: This Week in DAOS
items.content:
Nadia is a facilitator of the Growth Core Unit at MakerDAO, where her team focuses on business partnerships and integrations of $DAI.

We talked about:
Typical day for a DAO worker, differences between working at DAO and working at traditional corp, difficulties of working at DAO rn.

Follow Nadia on Twitter (@nad8802)
Follow Kohei on Twitter (@koheingt)
Follow Shun on Twitter (@shunkakinoki)

‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒

MakerDAO (https://twitter.com/MakerDAO)
Growth unit (https://forum.makerdao.com/c/core-units/growth/37)
$DAI (https://developer.makerdao.com/dai/1/)

items.creator: This Week in DAOS
items.title: This Week in DAOs #005
items.dc:creator: This Week in DAOS
items.content:
Pet3rpan is an investor at 1kx, and co-founder of Metacartel and Metacartel Ventures. Also he is one of the biggest contributor for DAO space.


We talked about:

Composability and business model of DAO tooling, How he came up with the idea of KPI oriented sub-DAO and the history of DAOs and his favourite use cases of DAO.

Follow Pet3r on Twitter (@pet3rpan_)
Follow Kohei on Twitter (@koheingt)
Follow Shun on Twitter (@shunkakinoki)

‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒
Links from the show:

Metacartel: https://twitter.com/Meta_Cartel
Moloch DAO: https://twitter.com/MolochDAO
KPI oriented Sub-DAO: https://pet3rpan.mirror.xyz/5nsl1Xnr-BwmNAPoNeMlghPiTFMhxNg4zE7suaR0sXc
1kx: https://twitter.com/1kxnetwork

items.creator: This Week in DAOS
items.title: This Week in DAOs #004
items.dc:creator: This Week in DAOS
items.content:
Thomas is a contributor of Index Coop, and co-founder of $DATA, The DATA Economy Index captures the growth of data-centric Web3 protocols.

We talked about:

  • How service protocol DAOs and product DAOs differ
  • How DAOs are superior in terms of getting all sorts of manual labor currently organized by lawyers and paperwork
  • Thomas’s experience about founding DAOs compared to LLCs
  • Difference between sub-DAOs and traditional DAOS

Follow Thomas on Twitter (@thomas_hepner)
|Follow Kohei on Twitter (@koheingt)
Follow Shun on Twitter (@shunkakinoki)

‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒
Links from the show:

$DATA: https://twitter.com/DATA_Index
DAO Haus: https://daohaus.club/
Thomas: https://twitter.com/thomas_hepner
Filecoin: https://filecoin.io/

‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒
Follow This Week in DAOs on Twitter at @TWiDAOs

items.creator: This Week in DAOS
items.title: This Week in DAOs #003
items.dc:creator: This Week in DAOS
items.content:
Chase Chapman is a cofounder & advisor at decentology, an active and core contributor in many of DAOs including forefront, index, and rabbit hole, an angel investor, a crypto & DAO mastermind among many others.

We talk about:

  • Self-org structures vs traditional corp
  • DAOs and compensation - where and how to bridge the gap
  • What we can learn from traditional orgs

Follow Chase on Twitter (@chaserchapman)
Follow Kohei on Twitter (@koheingt)
Follow Shun on Twitter (@shunkakinoki)

‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒
Links from the show:

Elastic Governance Tokens: https://mirror.xyz/spf.eth/qrR4MI-Ush_kswZ9d_r-IHSY2tqy1KqN0t_Yo0U4XYM
Chase’s twitter: https://twitter.com/chaserchapman

items.creator: This Week in DAOS
items.title: This Week in DAOs #002
items.dc:creator: This Week in DAOS
items.content:
Brian Flynn is a co-founder of Rabbithole, former employee at Dapper Labs & Opensea, and a DAO pioneer.

We talked about:

  • The origins of Rabbithole, and how crypto is going mainstream
  • The future of governance for DAOs
  • How to onboard the next million people to DAOs

Follow Brian on Twitter (@Flynnjamm)
Follow Kohei on Twitter (@koheingt)
Follow Shun on Twitter (@shunkakinoki)

‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒
Links from the show:

Brian’s Twitter: https://twitter.com/Flynnjamm
Rabbithole: https://rabbithole.gg/
Rabbithole’s meta-gov: https://twitter.com/rabbithole_gg/status/1480680633546559497
Developer DAO: https://www.developerdao.com/

items.creator: This Week in DAOS
items.title: This Week in DAOs #001
items.dc:creator: This Week in DAOS
items.content:
Spencer is from DAOhaus, a platform for launching Moloch DAOs, a Raid Guild member, and a DAO evangelist.

We talk about:

  • What a DAO is
  • How DAOs can go mainstream
  • Importance of Rage Quitting in DAOs

Follow Spencer on Twitter (@spengrah) Follow Kohei on Twitter (@koheingt) Follow Shun on Twitter (@shunkakinoki)

‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒

Links from the show:

Spencer’s Twitter: https://twitter.com/spengrah
DAO Haus: https://daohaus.club/
DAO Haus’s Rage Quit: https://daohaus.club/docs/users/rage-quit/

items.creator: This Week in DAOS
items.title: This Week in DAOs #000
items.dc:creator: This Week in DAOS
items.content:
Alexander is the co-founder of Creaton. Alexander talks web3 social, the future of DAOs, and how DAOs will emerge to change the society.
Follow Alexander on Twitter (@Aer0xander)
Follow Shun on Twitter (@shunkakinoki)

‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒

feed.creator: This Week in DAOS
feed.title: This Week In DAOs
feed.description:
We interview the cutting edge founders, investors and innovators in the emerging world of DAOs. Get an insider’s look into DAOs, learn how to start and join your favorite DAOs, and take a look into how DAOs have the potential to change our society as we know it and beyond.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/TWiDAOs
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/9VTzKygcBG
Website: https://twidaos.com
